title: Brodie Retallick: England are strong and they are always physical - I remember that 2012 loss well
text:
Five years ago, Brodie Retallick was asked whether he knew any members of the England touring party who had arrived in New Zealand for a three-Test series.

“A couple”, he said. When asked to name an individual, he paused before venturing “Michael Laws”, apparently confusing the Northampton lock with the former Mayor of Whanganui. Retallick did not appreciate being reminded of that little episode today. “Is that supposed to be humorous? I made a mistake, called them the wrong name, the name of a New Zealand politician. Good on you.”

Certainly, he knows who England’s players are now...
description: Five years ago, Brodie Retallick was asked whether he knew any members of the England touring party who had arrived in New Zealand for a three-Test series.
